body.name: HOJINLINERO Full Size Bed Frame with Headboard, Heavy Duty Platform Bed Frame Full Reinforced Steel Square Tube Platform Strong Slats Support/No Box Spring Needed,Black and Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 23 mins
features: 【High Quality】:Bed Frame Full Size is made of steel with ultimate strength,strong metal structure with solid leg and center support slats support the mattress prevent it from moving or sagging.
【Ideal Size and Enough Weight】Wood Bed Frame size: 83.07” x 54.72” x 34.84” (length x width x height), weight: 64.6 pounds. Mattress not included.
【Retro and Elegant】: High-quality P2 grade MDF Board, strong, waterproof, scratch-resistant, and elegant in appearance, this double bed frame is the stylish finishing touch to your bedroom.

【Easy to Assemble】: The base de lit double bed frame assembly instructions are very clear and easy to understand, and each part has a clear label and number. Everything is included in the package and no additional tools are required.

【Worry-free After-sales Service】: HOJINLINERO provides a one-year warranty and free replacement of accessories. If you find any problems with the Full bedframe, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will solve your problem within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOJINLINERO Black Twin/Full/Queen Bed Frame,Platform Bed Frame No Box Spring Needed,Mattress Foundation
HOJINLINERO Metal Twin/Full/Queen Size bed frame with Headboard Storage,Clean Design and Easy Assembly

High-grade MDF Wood Board The headboard & footboard are made of durable P2 grade MDF wood,which is solid and waterproof. Anti-Mattress Sliding Design T-tube design increases the bearing support point.The bed frame will be more sturdy and durable. Sturdy Metal Frame High temperature treatment powder painting process to avoid paint peeling or rusting. Modern square metal frame add a radiant and stylish look to your dream house. Stable Construction The Wide and Thick Retro frosted square tube metal frame and strong metal slats support provide great stability.

Modern Platform Bed Frame Queen/Full/Twin Bed Frame with Headboard/Storage Color Brown/Teak OAK Upholstery Material Metal Slat Support + MDF Headboard Twin Size Dimension 77.95"L x 39.76"W x 34.84"H Full Size Dimension 77.95"L x54.72"Wx34.84"H Queen Size Dimension 83.07"L x 60.63"W x 34.84"H Weight Capacity 800 lbs Install Required Yes Box Spring Required No

HOJINLINERO Metal Bed Frame with Wood Headboard and Footboard,Twin /Full/Queen Size Platform Bed with Storage Platform Bed Frame with Wood Headboard storage support system for your beloved mattress,the Platform Bed Frames with Vintage headboard will charm any bedroom it adorns.This soundly built foundation features a Metal frame with a rustic finish and unique, natural wood knots and patterns. And to help you eliminate the box spring once and for all,The Platform Bed Frame support the life of any mattress you rest upon it.It's also reinforced with steel for extra durability that'll have you snoozing soundly for many nights to come. Packaged includes: 1:Steel Metal bedframe 2: MDF wood 3:Assembly instructions 4:Screws + Allen key

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my sons room and it has been great! Exactly as pictured and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what i need it!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble, would need two people to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice bed frame for the money - instructions could be better
reviews.reviewText: This is overall a good bed frame. We built this frame in about two hours. One thing that slowed us down was getting the vinyl/wooden boards to properly fit in the frame ends. The instructions were a little confusing for this part as the way the picture is oriented did not seem to match up properly. Eventually, we were able to get it setup right. It held about 400lbs with no problems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I worried about a metal frame, but it's a smaller room so the sleigh bed was not going to look great. This bed is the perfect idea for small rooms you still want to look nice! The wood grain look of the head and footboard is wonderful. A pain to get on lol but beautiful. We are happy with the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is for thinner mattresses with no box springs
reviews.reviewText: I bought this without looking over the measurements carefully. I have a high quality mattress and 3 inch bunk board, and after assembling the bed it’s got this “fat mattress on a little bed” vibe going on. It’s a good quality product with semi ok instructions. Pay careful attention to head board and foot board assemblies and those are not pre-drilled. It’s best to mount the bottom on the ledge then do the top part of each piece. I paid 180.00 for the frame, and I’m using it in a guest room that won’t really get much use, so it’s okay but overall it’s not the “look” I was shooting for. If this headboard was another 12 inches to 24 inches taller it would have been great. If the frame legs would have had a lower, closer to the door iptim that would have solved it for me, but it doesn’t. All in all, use this with a thinner mattress for the best “look”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and affordable
reviews.reviewText: it was time consuming, but not hard. I liked that they really had everything labeled and separated and you could find what you needed. Directions not awful. I think I'm just getting use to pictures and figuring it out. But put it together all my myself. It's alot of bending, and time for one old lady

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They wernt kiding when they said it doesn’t squeak it’s the best bed frame I’ve ever owned and gorgeous

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: I finally decided to build the bed, first off it was a lot of parts to build, but the fact that the board overlapped the bed made it more complicated, everything didn’t align and I also was missing some screws that I had to substitute with screws I had in my home, I was really excited to get this bed but it’s not worth it.
love the bed but sooooo many pieces!

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived damaged - no contact from company
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame itself is lovely. The colour of the wood is nice, and once put together it was very sturdy.However, after assembling the metal frame and attaching the footboard, we brought out the headboard box (everything is boxed separately and then put together for shipping). That’s when we saw that the box was damaged (photo attached). We opened the box hoping the wood was still ok, but it was badly cracked (photo attached).We decided to send the damaged board back with a request to have a replacement piece mailed to us. We had already put together the majority of the bed and the headboard was the only thing left. This was in August, and we shipped the headboard back, but we haven’t heard anything from the company (nor have I figured out how to contact them directly).We don’t even want a refund, just the replacement headboard.Giving this 2 stars because of this, but would absolutely give it 5 stars if we could get the replacement board.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quiet frame for those who toss and turn
reviews.reviewText: Frame is fairly easy to assemble. Only advise is to keep a ratchet set on you at all times. There are a lot of screws and they are very similar in length so do not mix them and you should label the bags just in case so you don't find yourself at the end with wrong length screws.I toss around a lot and with a high quality, thick memory foam mattress, there is no squeaking and the frame stays intact. Wife is now very happy to be able to sleep.
